about_the_game:
UPDATES SINCE RELEASE


In addition to the original DLC described below, we continue to add new assets to our DLCs based on community feedback. Since the release of the PBR update to GameGuru, we have been upgrading assets with additional PBR textures. These updates have included:

  • Sandstone structures, concrete bunkers and rickety old sheds
  • Full break-down of two buildings to reconstruct any way you like

Original GameGuru Buildings Pack


This pack contains 50+ quality building assets all ready to be used in your GameGuru creations.

  • 4 Concrete Bunkers (all with internal spaces)
  • 4 Office Blocks
  • 5 Skyscrapers
  • 4 Warehouses
  • 4 Grunge buildings
  • 4 Sandstone buildings (all with internal spaces)
  • 4 Gothic style
  • 4 Flats
  • 5 Houses
  • 4 Huts (1 with internals)
  • 4 Shanty huts (all with internals)
  • 4 Sheds (all with internals)

These are mostly scenery buildings with just a few that allow the player to enter. We do plan to extend the range of buildings as we develop more for the pack. There are currently 17 buildings in the pack that are modelled both inside and outside. We're working on an update that will allow for more of the buildings to have internal areas and doors that open and close.

The pack will effortlessly install direct into your GameGuru library. When you run GameGuru and click on New Entity in the Library you will see a new section called "Buildings Pack". Click on it to start exploring your new library resource of game assets.
All the assets in this Mega Pack are royalty free, meaning any game you make with them can be legally sold by you.

UPDATES SINCE RELEASE


In addition to the original DLC described below, we continue to add new assets to our DLCs based on community feedback. Since the release of the PBR update to GameGuru, we have been upgrading assets with additional PBR textures. These updates have included:

  • Sandstone structures, concrete bunkers and rickety old sheds

Original GameGuru Buildings Pack


This pack contains 50+ quality building assets all ready to be used in your GameGuru creations.

These are mostly scenery buildings with just a few that allow the player to enter. We do plan to extend the range of buildings as we develop more for the pack. There are currently 17 buildings in the pack that are modelled both inside and outside. We're working on an update that will allow for more of the buildings to have internal areas and doors that open and close.

name: GameGuru - Buildings Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 - (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: This GameGuru DLC pack contains 50+ quality building assets all ready to be used in your GameGuru creations. It includes concrete bunkers, office blocks, warehouses, sandstone buildings, gothic styled buildings, flats, houses, huts and sheds. Ideal for populating your game environments.
